alert.note: Alert for Clark (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:52PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Clark County through 630 PM CDT... At 551 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Fordham Colony, or 10 miles south of Clark, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mayfield Colony and Silver Lake. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
